description: Abstract base model for all ISA-95 models
title: Base ISA-95 model
$comment: Not part of the ISA-95 standard

links.dtdl:name: tags
links.x-jsonschema:$comment: Not part of the ISA-95 standard. Makes querying easier. See https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/digital-twins/how-to-use-tags

ID.description: Objects in the information model which require unique identifications contain an ID attribute, which are unique within the scope of the exchanged information
ID.comment: According to 4.5.5.1 Object identification in ANSI/ISA-95.00.02-2018
